Title: WPF Rich Editor Library
Description: WPF Rich Editor Library is a WPF UserControl with "Word-like" text editor. Written in C#. Project use RibbonControlsLibrary for user-friendly ribbon menu and open-source & modified "convertHTML" library for export/import FlowDocument and HTML format.
HomeWiki:
Project Description

WPF Rich Editor Library is a WPF UserControl with "Word-like" text editor. Written in C#. Project use RibbonControlsLibrary for user-friendly ribbon menu and open-source & modified "convertHTML" library for export/import FlowDocument and HTML format.

Prerequisites:
  1. .NET Framework 3.5 SP1
  2. Ribbon Control from RibbonControlLibrary (Check out the Ribbon Feature Walkthrough on WindowsClient.net)
Programming language: C#
